item.description:
Due to the growing popularity of Boston Bookcrossing Meetups, we have decided to expand to two meetings per month. In addition to our regular second-Tuesday meetups, there will be another meetup once every four weeks on a Saturday afternoon. This is the second installation of the Boston Bookcrossing Saturday Chapter.

Come for lunch, or come for coffee, but definitely come for the conversation. On the agenda is our regular book-themed schmoozing and smorgasbord of bookcrossing-registered books. (http://www.bookcrossi...) This location has free wi-fi, so if you forget to register your books or you're not sure how, you can register them on the spot. (Bringing books is optional.)

This venue worked out well for the first Saturday Chapter meeting in March, so we'll meet here again for April.

New members are always welcome!

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a pile of books on the table & a small sign with the Ballycumber logo
item.name: The Boston Bookcrossing April Meetup -- Saturday Chapter
